nodes.text: These ruins lay deep within a jungle on the planet of Oznek. In 22 BBY, during the Clone Wars, a squad of Galactic Republic clone troopers led by Clone Sergeant Banks went on a mission on the planet, having been led to believe that the planet had allied itself with the Confederacy of Independent Systems. During a long trek through the jungle, they came across these ruins, where they were attacked and captured by the native species, the Toma.
